amendment.description: Pursuant to the provisions of H.Res. 780, the amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in the Congressional Record of November 12, 2025 is considered adopted.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. McGovern.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
